Pre-Game Insights: Cameroon is aiming for nothing less than three points in their opening Group C match against Guinea.
Guinea fell shy of being crowned champions in 1976 and are eager to make a name for themselves on the continent.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match set to take place at Yamoussoukro’s Stade Charles Konan Banny.
Cameroon won their first ever TotalEnergies CAF AFCON title back in 1984 in Cote d’Ivoire.
Others: The Indomitable Lions of Cameroon are making their 21st TotalEnergies CAF Africa Cup of Nations appearance.
The Elephants of Guinea are making their 14th appearance at the continental finals.
